nodes.title: etcd
nodes.description: The etcd operator creates, configures, and manages etcd clusters on Kubernetes. Automatically scales and backs up your data

nodes.title: Vault
nodes.description: The Vault operator deploys and manages Vault clusters on Kubernetes. Vault instances created by the Vault operator are highly available and support automatic failover and upgrade.

nodes.title: Prometheus
nodes.description: The Prometheus operator creates/configures/manages Prometheus clusters atop Kubernetes

nodes.title: Rook
nodes.description: Rook is an open source cloud-native storage orchestrator for Kubernetes, providing the platform, framework, and support for a diverse set of storage solutions to natively integrate with cloud-native environments.

nodes.title: ElasticSearch â€” UPMC Enterprise
nodes.description: The ElasticSearch operator is designed to manage one or more elastic search clusters. Included in the project (initially) is the ability to create the Elastic cluster, deploy the data nodes across zones in your Kubernetes cluster, and snapshot indexes to AWS S3.

nodes.title: MongoDB Enterprise
nodes.description: The MongoDB Enterprise Kubernetes Operator enables easy deploys of MongoDB into Kubernetes clusters, using our management, monitoring and backup platforms, Ops Manager and Cloud Manager. By installing this integration, you will be able to deploy MongoDB instances with a single simple command.

nodes.title: Dynatrace OneAgent
nodes.description: The Dynatrace OneAgent Operator which supports the rollout and lifecycle of Dynatrace OneAgent in Kubernetes and OpenShift clusters. Rolling out Dynatrace OneAgent via DaemonSet on a cluster is straightforward. Maintaining its lifecycle places a burden on the operational team. Dynatrace OneAgent Operator closes this gap by automating the repetitive steps involved in keeping Dynatrace OneAgent at its latest desired version.

nodes.title: Couchbase Autonomous
nodes.description: The Couchbase Autonomous Operator for Kubernetes enables cloud portability and automates operational best practices for deploying and managing the Couchbase Data Platform.

nodes.title: Syndesis
nodes.description: The Syndesis Infrastructure Operator for installing and updating Syndesis.

nodes.title: Tensorflow
nodes.description: Operator For TensorFlow jobs

nodes.title: Apache Spark â€” GCP
nodes.description: Kubernetes operator for specifying and managing the lifecycle of Apache Spark applications on Kubernetes.

nodes.title: Pytorch
nodes.description: Operator for PyTorch jobs

nodes.title: MPI
nodes.description: The MPI Operator makes it easy to run allreduce-style distributed training.

nodes.title: Chainer
nodes.description: Operator For Chainer/ChainerMN jobs currently only serves as a proof of concept for running distributed training with Chainer/ChainerMN on Kubernetes.

nodes.title: MXnet
nodes.description: An Operator for Apache MXNet jobs

nodes.title: Xoe Labs Odoo
nodes.description: Odoo Operator (alpha) using Red Hat's operator-framework to run Odoo Instances professionally at scale.

nodes.title: Redis
nodes.description: The Redis Enterprise Operator is the fastest, most efficient way to deploy and maintain a Redis Enterprise Cluster in Kubernetes.

nodes.title: Vitess â€” PlanetScale
nodes.description: The Vitess Operator provides automation that simplifies the administration of Vitess clusters on Kubernetes.

nodes.title: Crunchy PostgreSQL
nodes.description: The CrunchyData Postgres Operator is a controller that runs within a Kubernetes cluster that provides a means to deploy and manage PostgreSQL clusters.

nodes.title: Confluent Apache Kafka
nodes.description: Confluent Operator automates provisioning, management and operations of the entire Confluent Platform using the Kubernetes Operator API.

nodes.title: Strimzi Kafka
nodes.description: Strimzi provides a way to run an Apache Kafka cluster on Kubernetes or OpenShift in various deployment configurations.

nodes.title: Vitess
nodes.description: Vitess Operator provides automation that simplifies the administration of Vitess clusters on Kubernetes.

nodes.title: Dask (alpha)
nodes.description: Vitess Operator provides automation that simplifies the administration of Vitess clusters on Kubernetes.

nodes.title: Tidb â€” PingCAP
nodes.description: TiDB operator creates and manages TiDB clusters running in Kubernetes.

nodes.title: Apache Spark â€” Radanalytics.io
nodes.description: ConfigMap and CRD operator for managing the Spark clusters in Kubernetes and OpenShift.

nodes.title: InfluxDB
nodes.description: The Kubernetes operator to manage InfluxDB and the TICK Stack.

nodes.title: NATS
nodes.description: This operator manages NATS clusters atop Kubernetes, automating their creation and administration.

nodes.title: Envoy
nodes.description: Envoy Operator creates/configures/manages Envoy clusters atop Kubernetes

nodes.title: UPMC ElasticSearch
nodes.description: The ElasticSearch operator is designed to manage one or more elastic search clusters. Included in the project (initially) is the ability to create the Elastic cluster, deploy the data nodes across zones in your Kubernetes cluster, and snapshot indexes to AWS S3.

nodes.title: External DNS
nodes.description: Configure external DNS servers (AWS Route53, Google CloudDNS and others) for Kubernetes Ingresses and Services

nodes.title: JetStack Cert Manager
nodes.description: Automatically provision and manage TLS certificates in Kubernetes

nodes.title: Aerospike Operator
nodes.description: The Aerospike Operator manages Aerospike clusters atop Kubernetes, automating their creation and administration.

nodes.title: Jaeger
nodes.description: Jaeger Operator for Kubernetes. Jaeger is a distributed tracing system. It can be used for monitoring microservices-based distributed systems

nodes.title: Camel-K
nodes.description: Apache Camel K (a.k.a. Kamel) is a lightweight integration framework built from Apache Camel that runs natively on Kubernetes and is specifically designed for serverless and microservice architectures.

nodes.title: Dex SSO â€” Jenkins-x
nodes.description: Single Sign-On Kubernetes operator for dex, which can provision, expose and manage a SSO proxy for a Kubernetes service.

nodes.title: Cassandra â€” Pantheon
nodes.description: Operator for managing Cassandra clusters

nodes.title: Percona Server for MongoDB (alpha)
nodes.description: A Kubernetes operator for Percona Server for MongoDB

nodes.title: Percona XtraDB Cluster (alpha)
nodes.description: A Kubernetes operator for Percona Percona XtraDB Clusters

nodes.title: Stork â€” Libopenstorage â€” Portworx
nodes.description: Stork is a Cloud Native storage orchestration runtime scheduler plugin. It translates a scheduler's orchestration decisions into someting that an external cloud native storage solution can act upon. By doing so, it extends Kubernetes with more stateful awareness of the underlying storage provider, it's capabilities and state.

nodes.title: Zookeeper â€” Pravega
nodes.description: ZooKeeper is a centralized service for maintaining configuration information, naming, providing distributed synchronization, and providing group services.

nodes.title: Pravega (alpha)
nodes.description: Pravega is an open source distributed storage service implementing Streams.

nodes.title: InfraBox â€” SAP
nodes.description: InfraBox is a continuous integration system.

nodes.title: Kubernetes Pod Restarter â€” Rebuy
nodes.description: Operator that deletes targeted Kubernetes Pods to force a regular restart.

nodes.title: Falco
nodes.description: Kubernetes operator for Sysdig Falco.

nodes.title: M3DB
nodes.description: The M3DB Operator is a project dedicated to setting up M3DB on Kubernetes. It aims to automate everyday tasks around managing M3DB.

nodes.title: VPC Peering
nodes.description: The VPC Peering operator for Kubernetes provides a way to natively define a vpc peering as a Kubernetes object and handles the lifecycle around the Peering and Routing for a VPC.

nodes.title: Black Duck Synopsys Admin
nodes.description: Synopsys Operator is a cloud-native administration utility for Synopsys software. The Synopsys Operator assists in the deployment and management of Synopsys software in cloud-native environments (i.e., Kubernetes and OpenShift).

nodes.title: Black Duck OpsSight Connector
nodes.description: The Black Duck OpsSight Connector provides software composition analysis of open-source components of containers in OpenShift v3.x and Kubernetes clusters.

nodes.title: Kubevirt Web UI
nodes.description: The kubernetes operator for managing Kubevirt Web UI deployment. Leverages the operator-sdk.

nodes.title: Eclipse Che/Codeready
nodes.description: Che Operator creates Eclipse Che k8s and OpenShift resources such as pvcs, services, deployments, routes, ingresses etc.

nodes.title: KeyCloak
nodes.description: A Kubernetes Operator based on the Operator SDK for syncing resources in Keycloak.

nodes.title: Gitea
nodes.description: An Operator that installs Gitea. Installation is performed by creating a custom resource of kind Gitea. You can uninstall Gitea by removing this resource. The Operator will also watch all Gitea resources and reinstall them if they are deleted.

nodes.title: Kubernetes Federation
nodes.description: Kubernetes Federation is a tool to sync (aka federate) a set of Kubernetes objects from a source into a set of other clusters. Common use-cases include federating Namespaces across all of your clusters or rolling out an application across several geographically distributed clusters.

nodes.title: AWS Controllers for Kubernetes (ACK)
nodes.description: AWS Controllers for Kubernetes (ACK) lets you define and use AWS service resources directly from Kubernetes. With ACK, you can take advantage of AWS managed services for your Kubernetes applications without needing to define resources outside of the cluster or run services that provide supporting capabilities like databases or message queues within the cluster.

nodes.title: Kie Cloud Operator
nodes.description: OCP Operator for KIE Group the Drools rule engine, OptaPlanner constraint solver and jBPM workflow engine.

nodes.title: Multicluster-Controller Operator
nodes.description: Multicluster-controller is a Go library for building Kubernetes controllers that need to watch resources in multiple clusters. It uses the best parts of controller-runtime (the library powering kubebuilder and now operator-sdk) and replaces its API (the manager, controller, reconcile, and handler packages) to support multicluster operations.

nodes.title: Habitat Operator (alpa)
nodes.description: The Habitat operator is a Kubernetes controller designed to solve running and auto-managing Habitat Services on Kubernetes. It does this by making use of Custom Resource Definitions.

nodes.title: StorageOS Cluster Operator
nodes.description: The StorageOS Cluster Operator deploys and configures a StorageOS cluster on Kubernetes.
